answers.answer: You can go to your tracker page -http://www.medhelp.org/health_tools- you can add the Diabetes tracker, and choose it for someone else, and then you can name them for each child.  Hope this helps :)

question: I have two kids with diabetes. Do I have to set up different accounts for them or is there a way to add second and third diabetes trackers under my profile?
title: Multiple trackers
